original_text: Ever since God made the world, he has been showing people clearly about himself. We cannot see God. But the things that he has made show us clearly what he is like. We can understand his great power that continues for ever. We can know that he is the true God. So there is no reason for anyone to say, ‘We could not know about God.’
korean_text: 창세로부터 그의 보이지 아니하는 것들 곧 그의 영원하신 능력과 신성이 그가 만드신 만물에 분명히 보여 알려졌나니 그러므로 그들이 핑계하지 못할지니라

sentences.original_text: Ever since God made the world
he has been showing people clearly about himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 자신에 대해 분명히 보여주고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: But the things that he has made
show us clearly what he is like
We can understand his great power
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그의 위대한 능력을 이해할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: We can know that he is the true God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그가 참된 하나님이심을 알 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: So there is no reason for anyone to say
We could not know about God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님에 대해 알 수 없었다
